amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-391 to require the U.S. Department of Interior consider the threat of invasive species when it makes decisions on hydropower licensing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-391 to require the U.S. Department of Interior consider the threat of invasive species when it makes decisions on hydropower licensing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Grothman.
